name: UtahBallotInformation
0:
”Alexa, ask Utah Ballot Information about Amendment A.”
”Alexa, ask Utah Ballot Information for Greg Adams.”
”Alexa, open Utah Ballot Information and tell me about Proposition 3.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: utah ballot information
des: This Alexa skill contains general voting information for all Utah voters for the General Election on November 6, 2018. You will find information about candidates, ballot questions, amendments and propositions. You can visit VOTE.UTAH.GOV to find even more information about the election.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
